G5E.F.summary: Tsogo Sun Gaming Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the gaming and entertainment business in South Africa. It operates casinos and hotels, limited payout machines (LPMs), and electronic bingo terminals. The company's gaming and entertainment options include theatre productions, movies, restaurants, ten-pin bowling, a theme park, and others. It operates 14 Tsogo Sun Gaming casinos, 21 Galaxy bingo sites, and VSlots LPMs, as well as Sandton Convention Centre. The company was formerly known as Tsogo Sun Holdings Limited and changed its name to Tsogo Sun Gaming Limited in July 2019. Tsogo Sun Gaming Limited was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Fourways, South Africa.

SUI.JO.summary: Sun International Limited owns and operates casinos, hotels, and resort properties in South Africa, Swaziland, Nigeria, and Latin America. It operates or has an interest in a total of 19 resorts, luxury hotels, and casinos. Sun International Limited was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Sandton, South Africa.
